> Hydras was furious and yelled by the "I WANT THOSE INTRUDERS AND IF ONE OF THEM RUNS YOU WIL SUFFER MY WRATh!!!!"

Zarak nodded from inside Scorponok as Hydras finished venting his
wrath over the radio, "We will find them." He said as he continued to
move through the hall. While he was dismissive of the other Predacons,
Zarak knew how powerful Hydras was, and was not ready to cross him . .
. yet.

As Scorponok moved through the base, and listened to the base defenses
come online, it made it easier to find his quarry. He arrived just in
time to see Darkhawk attaching the torture device to the Autobot.

"Good. I will help you escort him." Scorponok said as he transformed
into his robot mode, "And this time I have some extra firepower in
case he runs!" Scorponok said almost eagerly as his shoulder mounted
gun mounts came online for a moment.

(TAG)

Preston
(Scorponok)
